newsitem.title: USA: Payless ShoeSource April sales rise.
newsitem.headline: Payless ShoeSource April sales rise.

text.p: Payless ShoeSource Inc said Thursday that same store sales for the four weeks ended May 3 rose 3.2 percent.
Total April sales were $205.8 millino, up 6.7 percent from $192.9 million a year ago.
At the end of April, the company operated 4,236 Payless ShoeSource stores, compared with 4,477 a year ago.
Total sales for the first quarter of fiscal 1997 were $645.1 million, up 7.3 percent from $601.4 million a year ago. On a same-store basis, sales were up 6.4 percent.
